Package science.aist.machinelearning.algorithm.nn

Class NeuralNetwork<GT,​PT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • science.aist.machinelearning.core.AbstractAlgorithm<GT,​PT>
      • science.aist.machinelearning.algorithm.nn.NeuralNetwork<GT,​PT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm<GT,​PT>, Configurable
    public class NeuralNetwork<GT,​PT>
extends AbstractAlgorithm<GT,​PT>
    Neuronal Network based on a MultiLayerNetwork from deeplearning4j Documentation: https://deeplearning4j.org/documentation APIDoc: https://deeplearning4j.org/doc/ Examples: https://github.com/deeplearning4j/dl4j-examples/ Dependencies: https://deeplearning4j.org/quickstart#using-dl4j-in-your-own-projects-configuring-the-pomxml-file
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andreas Pointner

      • train

        public NeuralNetwork<GT,​PT> train​(List<Problem<PT>> input,
                                        List<Solution<GT,​PT>> output)
        This functions trains the neuronal network Make sure. that the input.get(i) problem matches to the output.get(i) solution Make sure if you call this function multiple time to train the network, that the Problem and Solution size is always the same.
        Parameters:
        input - input values
        output - solution to the given input

      • setActivation

        public NeuralNetwork<GT,​PT> setActivation​(org.nd4j.linalg.activations.Activation[] activations)
        Which actions type is used for which layer. this has hiddenLayers.size + 1 because also the activation for the output layer is stored here. Default is Sigmoid activation for hidden layers and Identity for output layer
        Parameters:
        activations - activations
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        BaseLayer.Builder.activation(Activation)

      • setActivation

        public NeuralNetwork<GT,​PT> setActivation​(int layerIdx,
                                                org.nd4j.linalg.activations.Activation activation)
        Which actions type is used for which layer. this has hiddenLayers.size + 1 because also the activation for the output layer is stored here. Default is Sigmoid activation for hidden layers and Identity for output layer
        Parameters:
        layerIdx - index of the layer. 0 .. first hiddenLayer. SizeOfHiddenLayers-1 .. last hidden layer; sizeOfHiddenLayers .. output layer
        activation - activations
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        BaseLayer.Builder.activation(Activation)

      • save

        public void save​(String path)
        Parameters:
        path - Where to save the network. Note: the file is in .zip format - can be opened externally

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isTrained

        public boolean isTrained()
        Returns:
        if the network is already trained

      • solve

        public Solution<GT,​PT> solve​(Problem<PT> problem,
                                   Solution<GT,​PT> bestSolution)
        At the moment there is on possibility to start with a best solution. this function will only call solve(problem)
        Parameters:
        problem - problem to be solved
        bestSolution - start search with this mapping
        Returns:
        solve(problem)
